title: Deltarune
description: Deltarune is a role-playing video game created by Toby Fox, the creator of Undertale. The game follows a similar style and tone as Undertale and features turn-based combat, exploration, and decision-making that impacts the story. Deltarune is released episodically, with Chapter 1 being available for free and subsequent chapters planned for release. The game features a charming cast of characters, engaging storytelling, and a unique blend of humor and emotional depth.
